locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Почніть звідси, щоб подати документи на цю конференцію.
Оберіть один з процесів подачі заявки
Ви можете завершити цю заяву пізніше, вибравши Активні Заяви на домашній сторінці автора.
Ця конференція ще не розпочала приймати заяви.
Подача заяви на цю конференцію закінчилась в {$closedDate}.
Реєстрація Автора закрита для цієї конференції.
Ви впевнені, що хочете видалити цю неповну заяву?
Зіткнулись з труднощами? Зв'яжіться з {$supportName} для допомоги ({$supportPhone}).
Зіткнулись з труднощами? Зв'яжіться з {$supportName} для допомоги.
Вберіть потроібний трек для цієї заяви (див. TПолітика відслідковування).
Визначте чи ця заява готова для розгляду в цій конференції, перевіривши наступне (коментарі до директора можуть бути додані нижче).
You must make sure all items in the submission checklist are satisfied before continuing.
The authors agree to the terms of this Copyright Notice, which will apply to this submission if and when it is published by this conference (comments to the director can be added below).
You must agree to the terms of the Copyright Notice before continuing.
At least one author is required.
The first name, last name, and email address of each author is required.
Please select an appropriate conference track for this submission.
Please enter an abstract for your submission.
Reorder authors to appear in the order they will be listed on publication.
Provide terms for indexing the submission; separate terms with a semi-colon (term1; term2; term3).
Identify agencies that provided funding or support for the work presented in this submission.
Use the hyperlinked classification system to select classification terms and, if appropriate, numbers.
At least one author is required.
The first name, last name, and email address of each author is required.
Please enter the title of your paper.
You have exceeded the maximum word limit for abstracts in this conference's track.
Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading a submission file?

This optional step allows Supplementary Files to be added to a submission. The files, which can be in any format, might include (a) research instruments, (b) data sets, which comply with the terms of the study's research ethics review, (c) sources that otherwise would be unavailable to readers, (d) figures and tables that cannot be integrated into the text itself, or other materials that add to the contribution of the work.
Click Save to upload file (after which additional files can be uploaded).
Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading the supplementary file you have chosen?
No supplementary files have been added to this submission.
Are you sure you want to delete this supplementary file?
To index this supplementary material, provide the following metadata for the uploaded supplementary file.
Present file to reviewers (without metadata), as it will not compromise blind review.
Use only with formally published materials.
Date when data was collected or instrument created.
Name of study or other point of origin.
Please enter the title of this supplementary file.
Public supplemental file identification already exists.

To submit your manuscript to {$conferenceTitle} click Finish Submission. The submission's principal contact will receive an acknowledgement by email and will be able to view the submission's progress through the editorial process by logging in to the conference web site. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$conferenceTitle}.
No files have been attached to this submission.
Submission complete. Thank you for submitting your work to {$conferenceTitle}.

If this submission is in a format that is ready to be published, without further review or editing work, it can be sent directly to the Proceedings page by Clicking here. (Note: Only conference directors have this option for their submissions.)

A user account is required to submit materials to this conference. This allows our directors to track your submissions and contact you when the status of your submission changes, or if additional information is required from you.
